trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula um [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The Graphics class provides methods for drawing objects to the display device.
trans-unit.target: A classe de elementos gráficos fornece métodos para desenhar objetos para o dispositivo de vídeo.

trans-unit.source: A Graphics is associated with a specific device context.
trans-unit.target: Um gráfico é associado um contexto de dispositivo específico.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a Graphics object by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on an object that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName>, or by handling a control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=fullName> event and accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter um objeto Graphics chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método em um objeto que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName>, ou pelo tratamento do controle do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=fullName>evento e acessar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>classe</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also create a Graphics object from an image by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode criar um objeto de gráfico de uma imagem usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a Graphics object, see [How to: Create Graphics Objects for Drawing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um objeto de gráfico, consulte [como: criar objetos gráficos para desenho](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can draw many different shapes and lines by using a Graphics object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode desenhar muitas formas diferentes e linhas usando um objeto de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see the specific `Draw`*GraphicalElement* method for the line or shape you want to draw.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como desenhar linhas e formas, consulte específico `Draw` *GraphicalElement* método para a linha ou de forma que você deseja desenhar.

trans-unit.source: These methods include <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawArc%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawClosedCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPolygon%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos incluem <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawArc%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawClosedCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPolygon%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPolygon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawClosedCurve%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawArc%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see [Using a Pen to Draw Lines and Shapes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Using a Brush to Fill Shapes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como desenhar linhas e formas, consulte [usando uma caneta para desenhar linhas e formas](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [usando um pincel para preencher formas](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also draw images and icons by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawIcon%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode desenhar ícones e imagens usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawIcon%2A>métodos, respectivamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawIcon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform a bit-block transfer of color data from the screen to the drawing surface of the Graphics object, see <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar uma transferência de bloco de bits de dados de cor da tela para a superfície de desenho do objeto Graphics, consulte <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to draw images with a Graphics object, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como desenhar imagens com um objeto de gráfico, consulte [trabalhando com imagens, Bitmaps, ícones e metarquivos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can manipulate the coordinate system used by the Graphics object.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, você pode manipular o sistema de coordenadas usado pelo objeto Graphics.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the coordinate system and how to manipulate it, see [Coordinate Systems and Transformations](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o sistema de coordenadas e como manipulá-los, consulte [sistemas de coordenadas e transformações](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds a comment to the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um comentário à atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is valid only if this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is associated with a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é válido apenas se este <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>está associado um <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Array of bytes that contains the comment.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que contém o comentário.

trans-unit.source: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and opens and uses a new graphics container.
trans-unit.target: Salva um contêiner de elementos gráficos com o estado atual deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> abre e usa um novo contêiner de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método para criar contêineres de elementos gráficos aninhados.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres de gráficos retêm estado de gráficos, como transformação, região de recorte e propriedades de processamento.

trans-unit.source: When you call the BeginContainer method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o método BeginContainer de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, um bloco de informações que mantém o estado do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é colocada em uma pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The BeginContainer method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginContainer retorna um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>que identifica esse bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the BeginContainer method call.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passa o objeto de identificação para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, o bloco de informações é removido da pilha e é usado para restaurar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para o estado em que se encontrava no momento da chamada do método BeginContainer.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the BeginContainer method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres podem ser aninhados. ou seja, você pode chamar o método BeginContainer várias vezes antes de chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the BeginContainer method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que você chamar o método BeginContainer, um bloco de informações é colocado na pilha, e você receber um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>para o bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the BeginContainer method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passar um desses objetos para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, o que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é retornado para o estado que ele foi no momento do método BeginContainer chamar que retornou que determinado <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that BeginContainer method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that BeginContainer method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: O bloco de informações colocadas na pilha de por que BeginContainer chamada de método é removida da pilha, e todos os blocos de informações colocado na pilha depois que essa chamada de método BeginContainer também serão removidos.

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the BeginContainer method.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>blocos de informações de local do método na mesma pilha de chamadas para o método BeginContainer.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a BeginContainer method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Assim como um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>chamada de método é associada a uma chamada de método BeginContainer, um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>chamada de método é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the BeginContainer method) after the corresponding call to the BeginContainer method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método ou pelo método BeginContainer) após a chamada correspondente para o método BeginContainer são removidos da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the BeginContainer method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método ou pelo método BeginContainer) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The graphics state established by the BeginContainer method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values.
trans-unit.target: O estado dos gráficos estabelecido pelo método BeginContainer inclui as qualidades de renderização do estado de gráfico padrão; qualquer alteração de estado de qualidade de renderização existente quando o método é chamado é redefinidas para os valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the time of the method call.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"> </xref> que representa o estado deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> no momento da chamada do método.

trans-unit.source: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and opens and uses a new graphics container with the specified scale transformation.
trans-unit.target: Salva um contêiner de elementos gráficos com o estado atual deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> abre e usa um novo contêiner de elementos gráficos com a transformação de escala especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método para criar contêineres de elementos gráficos aninhados.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres de gráficos retêm estado de gráficos, como transformação, região de recorte e propriedades de processamento.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, um bloco de informações que mantém o estado do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é colocada em uma pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método retorna um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>que identifica esse bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passa o objeto de identificação para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, o bloco de informações é removido da pilha e é usado para restaurar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para o estado em que estava no momento do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres podem ser aninhados. ou seja, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método várias vezes antes de chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que você chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método, um bloco de informações é colocado na pilha, e você recebe um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>para o bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passar um desses objetos para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, o que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é retornado para o estado em que estava no momento do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método de chamada que retornou que determinado <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: O bloco de informações é colocado na pilha de por que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método é removida da pilha e todos os blocos de informações é colocado na pilha depois disso <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método também serão removidos.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>blocos de informações de local do método na mesma pilha de chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Assim como um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>chamada de método é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método, uma <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>chamada de método é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Esse método Especifica uma transformação de escala para o novo contêiner de elementos gráficos com o `dstrect` e `srcrect` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`.
trans-unit.target: A escala é igual para a transformação que, quando aplicado a `srcrect`, resulta em `dstrect`.

trans-unit.source: The graphics state established by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values.
trans-unit.target: O estado dos gráficos estabelecidos pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método inclui as qualidades de renderização do estado de gráfico padrão, qualquer alteração de estado de qualidade de renderização existente quando o método é chamado é redefinidas para os valores padrão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that, together with the `srcrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>estrutura, junto com o `srcrect` , especifica uma transformação de escala para o contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that, together with the `dstrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>estrutura, junto com o `dstrect` , especifica uma transformação de escala para o contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure for the container.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref> enumeração que especifica a unidade de medida para o contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the time of the method call.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"> </xref> que representa o estado deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> no momento da chamada do método.

trans-unit.source: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and opens and uses a new graphics container with the specified scale transformation.
trans-unit.target: Salva um contêiner de elementos gráficos com o estado atual deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> abre e usa um novo contêiner de elementos gráficos com a transformação de escala especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method to create nested graphics containers.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método para criar contêineres de elementos gráficos aninhados.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres de gráficos retêm estado de gráficos, como transformação, região de recorte e propriedades de processamento.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, um bloco de informações que mantém o estado do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é colocada em uma pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método retorna um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>que identifica esse bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passa o objeto de identificação para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, o bloco de informações é removido da pilha e é usado para restaurar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para o estado em que estava no momento do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Contêineres podem ser aninhados. ou seja, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método várias vezes antes de chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que você chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método, um bloco de informações é colocado na pilha, e você recebe um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>para o bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passar um desses objetos para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, o que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é retornado para o estado em que estava no momento do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método de chamada que retornou que determinado <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: O bloco de informações é colocado na pilha de por que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método é removida da pilha e todos os blocos de informações é colocado na pilha depois disso <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método também serão removidos.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>blocos de informações de local do método na mesma pilha de chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as an <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Assim como um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>chamada de método é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método, uma <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>chamada de método é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the `Save` method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (pelo `Save` método ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Esse método Especifica uma transformação de escala para o novo contêiner de elementos gráficos com o `dstrect` e `srcrect` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`.
trans-unit.target: A escala é igual para a transformação que, quando aplicado a `srcrect`, resulta em `dstrect`.

trans-unit.source: The graphics state established by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values.
trans-unit.target: O estado dos gráficos estabelecidos pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método inclui as qualidades de renderização do estado de gráfico padrão, qualquer alteração de estado de qualidade de renderização existente quando o método é chamado é redefinidas para os valores padrão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that, together with the `srcrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>estrutura, junto com o `srcrect` , especifica uma transformação de escala para o novo contêiner de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that, together with the `dstrect` parameter, specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>estrutura, junto com o `dstrect` , especifica uma transformação de escala para o novo contêiner de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> enumeration that specifies the unit of measure for the container.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref> enumeração que especifica a unidade de medida para o contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"></xref> that represents the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> at the time of the method call.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer"> </xref> que representa o estado deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> no momento da chamada do método.

trans-unit.source: Clears the entire drawing surface and fills it with the specified background color.
trans-unit.target: Limpa toda a superfície de desenho e a preenche com a cor de plano de fundo especificada.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method clears the state of the graphics object and should not be called when the graphics object cannot be updated.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear limpa o estado do objeto graphics e não deve ser chamado quando o objeto graphics não pode ser atualizado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Clear method is called on a secure desktop in a terminal server session, an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> may occur, leaving the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object in an inconsistent state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o método Clear for chamado em uma área de trabalho segura em uma sessão do terminal server, um <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>pode ocorrer, deixando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto em um estado inconsistente.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the background color of the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>estrutura que representa a cor de plano de fundo da superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that limits the drawing region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> que limita a região desenho deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Modifying the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object returned by the Clip property does not affect subsequent drawing with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Modificando o <xref:System.Drawing.Region>objeto retornado pela propriedade Clip não afeta o desenho subsequente com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: To change the clip region, replace the Clip property value with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a região de corte, substitua o valor da propriedade clipe com um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Region>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the Clip property and call its <xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se a região de recorte é infinita, recuperar a propriedade Clip e chame seu <xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that limits the portion of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that is currently available for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> que limita a parte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que está atualmente disponível para o desenho.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that bounds the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura dos limites da região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o retângulo resultante é designada pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é geralmente associado um controle e a origem do retângulo serão relativas à área do cliente do controle.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: If the clipping region is infinite, the ClipBounds property returns a meaningless large rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Se a região de recorte é infinita, a propriedade ClipBounds retorna um retângulo grande sem sentido.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A> property and call its <xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se a região de recorte é infinita, recuperar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>propriedade e chame seu <xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Region.IsInfinite%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Clip%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents a bounding rectangle for the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura que representa um retângulo para a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies how composited images are drawn to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica como compostas imagens é desenhadas a este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The compositing mode determines whether pixels from a source image overwrite or are combined with background pixels.
trans-unit.target: O modo de composição determina se os pixels a partir de uma imagem de origem substituam ou são combinados com plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should not use a CompositingMode property value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode> when the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você não deve usar um valor da propriedade CompositingMode de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode>quando a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode>

trans-unit.source: An exception could occur or the image may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção pode ocorrer ou a imagem talvez não sejam renderizadas corretamente.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica um membro do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering quality of composited images drawn to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a qualidade de renderização de imagens compostas desenhada para isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The compositing quality determines the rendering quality level of composited images.
trans-unit.target: A qualidade de composição determina o nível de qualidade de renderização de imagens compostos.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica um membro do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingQuality"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma transferência de bloco de bits de dados de cor, correspondente a um retângulo de pixels da tela para a superfície de desenho do <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CopyFromScreen methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos CopyFromScreen são úteis para uma imagem em camadas sobre o outro.

trans-unit.source: To specify how the source and destination colors are blended, use one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar como as cores de origem e destino são mescladas, use um do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>métodos que leva um <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation>parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de origem.

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da área a ser transferido.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma transferência de bloco de bits de dados de cor, correspondente a um retângulo de pixels da tela para a superfície de desenho do <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>métodos são úteis para uma imagem em camadas sobre outro.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `copyPixelOperation` parameter allows you to specify if and how the source colors should be blended with the colors in the destination area.
trans-unit.target: O `copyPixelOperation` parâmetro permite que você especifique se e como as cores de fonte devem ser combinadas com as cores na área de destino.

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de origem.

trans-unit.source: The point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da área a ser transferido.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: copyPixelOperation is not a member of .
trans-unit.target: copyPixelOperationnão é um membro de .

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of the color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma transferência de bloco de bits dos dados, a cor correspondente a um retângulo de pixels da tela para a superfície de desenho do <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>métodos são úteis para uma imagem em camadas sobre outro.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify how the source and destination colors are blended, use one of the CopyFromScreen methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar como as cores de origem e destino são mescladas, use um dos métodos CopyFromScreen que usa um <xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation>parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de origem.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de origem.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da área a ser transferido.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bit-block transfer of the color data, corresponding to a rectangle of pixels, from the screen to the drawing surface of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma transferência de bloco de bits dos dados, a cor correspondente a um retângulo de pixels da tela para a superfície de desenho do <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A> methods are useful for layering one image on top of another.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>métodos são úteis para uma imagem em camadas sobre outro.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CopyFromScreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `copyPixelOperation` parameter allows you to specify if and how the source colors should be blended with the colors in the destination area.
trans-unit.target: O `copyPixelOperation` parâmetro permite que você especifique se e como as cores de fonte devem ser combinadas com as cores na área de destino.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de origem.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the source rectangle
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de origem

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the point at the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponto no canto superior esquerdo do retângulo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The size of the area to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da área a ser transferido.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.CopyPixelOperation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: copyPixelOperation is not a member of .
trans-unit.target: copyPixelOperationnão é um membro de .

trans-unit.source: The operation failed.
trans-unit.target: A operação falhou.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose permite que os recursos usados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para ser realocada para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal resolution of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a resolução horizontal disso <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating high-resolution applications, see [High DPI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159804).

trans-unit.target: O valor, em pontos por polegada, para a resolução horizontal suportada por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws an arc representing a portion of an ellipse specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um arco que representa uma parte de uma elipse especificada por uma <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: This method draws an arc that is a portion of the perimeter of an ellipse.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desenha um arco que é uma parte do perímetro de uma elipse.

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is defined by the boundaries of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Elipse é definida pelos limites de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The arc is the portion of the perimeter of the ellipse between the `startAngle` parameter and the `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: O arco é a parte do perímetro da elipse entre o `startAngle` parâmetro e o `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the arc.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e o estilo do arco.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that defines the boundaries of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>estrutura que define os limites da elipse.

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the starting point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo em graus no sentido horário medida do eixo x para o ponto de partida do arco.

trans-unit.source: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the `startAngle` parameter to ending point of the arc.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo em graus no sentido horário medido a partir do `startAngle` parâmetro ao final do arco.

trans-unit.source: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline de Bézier definida por quatro <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: The Bézier curve is drawn from the first point to the fourth point.
trans-unit.target: A curva de Bézier é desenhada no primeiro ponto até o quarto ponto.

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Os segundo e terceiro pontos são pontos de controle que determina a forma da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> structure that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>estrutura que determina a cor, a largura e o estilo da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>estrutura que representa o ponto de partida da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the first control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>estrutura que representa o primeiro ponto de controle da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the second control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>estrutura que representa o segundo ponto de controle da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>estrutura que representa o ponto final da curva.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline de Bézier definida por quatro <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: The Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point.
trans-unit.target: O spline de Bézier é desenhado no primeiro ponto até o quarto ponto.

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Os segundo e terceiro pontos são pontos de controle que determina a forma da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e o estilo da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure that represents the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>estrutura que representa o ponto final da curva.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four ordered pairs of coordinates that represent points.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline de Bézier definida por quatro pares ordenados de coordenadas que representam pontos.

trans-unit.source: The Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point.
trans-unit.target: O spline de Bézier é desenhado no primeiro ponto até o quarto ponto.

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Os segundo e terceiro pontos são pontos de controle que determina a forma da curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e o estilo da curva.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponto inicial da curva.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponto inicial da curva.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the first control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do primeiro ponto de controle da curva.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the first control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do primeiro ponto de controle da curva.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the second control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do segundo ponto de controle da curva.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the second control point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do segundo ponto de controle da curva.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do ponto final da curva.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the ending point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do ponto final da curva.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: Draws a series of Bézier splines from an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma série de splines de Bézier de uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1 because the first spline requires 4 points and any other splines require 3 points each.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos da matriz deve ser um múltiplo de 1 mais de 3 porque o spline primeiro requer 4 pontos e qualquer outras splines requerem 3 pontos.

trans-unit.source: The first Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point in the point array.
trans-unit.target: O primeira spline de Bézier é desenhado do primeiro ponto o quarto ponto na matriz de ponto.

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Os segundo e terceiro pontos são pontos de controle que determina a forma da curva.

trans-unit.source: Each subsequent curve needs exactly three more points: two more control points and an ending point.
trans-unit.target: Cada curva subsequente precisa exatamente três pontos mais: mais de dois pontos e um ponto final de controle.

trans-unit.source: The ending point of the previous curve is used as the starting point for each additional curve.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final da curva anterior é usado como o ponto de partida para cada curva adicional.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e o estilo da curva.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represent the points that determine the curve.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas que representam os pontos que determinam a curva.

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1, such as 4, 7, or 10.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos da matriz deve ser um múltiplo de 3 mais 1, como 4, 7 ou 10.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a series of Bézier splines from an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma série de splines de Bézier de uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1 because the first spline requires 4 points and any other splines require 3 points each.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos da matriz deve ser um múltiplo de 1 mais de 3 porque o spline primeiro requer 4 pontos e qualquer outras splines requerem 3 pontos.

trans-unit.source: The first Bézier curve is drawn from the first point to the fourth point in the point array.
trans-unit.target: A primeira curva de Bézier é desenhada do primeiro ponto para o quarto ponto na matriz de ponto.

trans-unit.source: The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Os segundo e terceiro pontos são pontos de controle que determina a forma da curva.

trans-unit.source: Each subsequent curve needs exactly three more points: two more control points and an ending point.
trans-unit.target: Cada curva subsequente precisa exatamente três pontos mais: mais de dois pontos e um ponto final de controle.

trans-unit.source: The ending point of the previous curve is used as the starting point for each additional curve.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final da curva anterior é usado como o ponto de partida para cada curva adicional.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e o estilo da curva.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represent the points that determine the curve.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que representam os pontos que determinam a curva.

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1, such as 4, 7, or 10.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos da matriz deve ser um múltiplo de 3 mais 1, como 4, 7 ou 10.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline cardeal fechada definida por uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desenha uma spline cardeal fechada que passam por cada ponto na matriz.

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the figure.
trans-unit.target: Se o último ponto não coincide com o primeiro ponto, um segmento de curva adicional é adicionado do último ponto até o primeiro ponto para fechar a figura.

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de pontos deve conter pelo menos quatro <xref:System.Drawing.Point>estruturas.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma tensão padrão de 0,5.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e a altura da curva.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas que definem o spline.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline cardeal fechada definida por uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desenha uma spline cardeal fechada que passam por cada ponto na matriz.

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: Se o último ponto não coincide com o primeiro ponto, um segmento de curva adicional é adicionado do último ponto até o primeiro ponto para fechá-la.

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de pontos deve conter pelo menos quatro <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>estruturas.</xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma tensão padrão de 0,5.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e a altura da curva.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que definem o spline.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures using a specified tension.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline cardeal fechada definida por uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas usando uma tensão especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desenha uma spline cardeal fechada que passam por cada ponto na matriz.

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: Se o último ponto não coincide com o primeiro ponto, um segmento de curva adicional é adicionado do último ponto até o primeiro ponto para fechá-la.

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de pontos deve conter pelo menos quatro <xref:System.Drawing.Point>estruturas.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: O `tension` parâmetro determina a forma de spline.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da `tension` parâmetro 0.0 f, esse método desenha segmentos de linha reta para se conectar os pontos.

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o `tension` parâmetro é menor ou igual a 1.0 f.

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: Valores em 1.0 f produzem resultados incomuns.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e a altura da curva.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas que definem o spline.

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Um valor maior que ou igual a 0.0 f que especifica a tensão da curva.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that determines how the curve is filled.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"> </xref> enumeração que determina como a curva é preenchida.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required but ignored.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro é necessário, mas ignorado.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.source: -or- points is .
trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures using a specified tension.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline cardeal fechada definida por uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas usando uma tensão especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desenha uma spline cardeal fechada que passam por cada ponto na matriz.

trans-unit.source: If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it.
trans-unit.target: Se o último ponto não coincide com o primeiro ponto, um segmento de curva adicional é adicionado do último ponto até o primeiro ponto para fechá-la.

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least four <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de pontos deve conter pelo menos quatro <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>estruturas.</xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline.
trans-unit.target: O `tension` parâmetro determina a forma de spline.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da `tension` parâmetro 0.0 f, esse método desenha segmentos de linha reta para se conectar os pontos.

trans-unit.source: Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o `tension` parâmetro é menor ou igual a 1.0 f.

trans-unit.source: Values over 1.0F produce unusual results.
trans-unit.target: Valores em 1.0 f produzem resultados incomuns.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e a altura da curva.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que definem o spline.

trans-unit.source: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Um valor maior que ou igual a 0.0 f que especifica a tensão da curva.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that determines how the curve is filled.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"> </xref> enumeração que determina como a curva é preenchida.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required but is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro é obrigatório, mas é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .

trans-unit.target: -or- points is .

trans-unit.source: This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desenha um spline cardinal que passam por cada ponto na matriz.

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least three <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures for a curve to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de pontos deve conter pelo menos três <xref:System.Drawing.Point>estruturas para desenhar uma curva.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma tensão padrão de 0,5.

trans-unit.source: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma spline cardeal por meio de um conjunto especificado de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: The drawing begins offset from the beginning of the array.
trans-unit.target: O desenho começa o deslocamento do início da matriz.

trans-unit.source: This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desenha um spline cardinal que passam por cada ponto na matriz.

trans-unit.source: The array of points must contain at least three <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures for a curve to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de pontos deve conter pelo menos três <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>estruturas para desenhar uma curva.</xref:System.Drawing.PointF>

trans-unit.source: The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `offset` parâmetro especifica o número de elementos a serem ignorados na matriz.

trans-unit.source: The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro elemento após os elementos ignorados representa o ponto de partida da curva.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `numberOfSegments` parâmetro especifica o número de segmentos, após o ponto de partida para desenhar na curva.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `numberOfSegments` parâmetro deve ser pelo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor da `offset` parâmetro mais o valor da `numberOfSegments` parâmetro deve ser menor que o número de elementos na matriz do `points` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method uses a default tension of 0.5.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa uma tensão padrão de 0,5.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>que determina a cor, a largura e o estilo da curva.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define the spline.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que definem o spline.

trans-unit.source: Offset from the first element in the array of the `points` parameter to the starting point in the curve.
trans-unit.target: Deslocamento do primeiro elemento na matriz do `points` parâmetro para o ponto de partida da curva.

trans-unit.source: Number of segments after the starting point to include in the curve.
trans-unit.target: Número de segmentos após o ponto de partida para incluir na curva.

trans-unit.source: pen is .
trans-unit.target: penis .
