trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the visible clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a região de recorte visível deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> está vazio.

trans-unit.source: The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this `Graphics` and the clipping region of the window.
trans-unit.target: A região de recorte visível é a interseção da região de recorte deste `Graphics` e a região de recorte da janela.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the visible portion of the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a parte visível da região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> estiver vazia; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> objetos, cada um deles circunda um intervalo de posições de caractere na cadeia de caracteres especificada.

trans-unit.source: The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution.
trans-unit.target: As regiões retornadas por esse método são depende de resolução, portanto, pode ser uma pequena perda de precisão se cadeias de caracteres são registradas em um metarquivo em uma resolução e reproduzidas mais tarde em uma resolução diferente.

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de caracteres para medidas.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>que define o formato de texto da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that specifies the layout rectangle for the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref>estrutura que especifica o retângulo de layout para a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref>que representa informações de formatação, como o espaçamento entre linhas, a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> objetos, cada um deles circunda um intervalo de posições de caractere na cadeia de caracteres especificada.

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mede a cadeia de caracteres especificada quando desenhado com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>método foi projetado para uso com o indivíduo cadeias de caracteres e inclui uma pequena quantidade de espaço extra antes e após a cadeia de caracteres para permitir em saliência em relação glifos.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>método ajusta pontos de glifo para otimizar a qualidade do vídeo e pode exibir uma cadeia de caracteres do relatado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter métricas adequadas para cadeias de caracteres adjacentes no layout (por exemplo, quando a implementação de texto formatado), use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>método ou uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>métodos que leva um <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>e passe <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, certifique-se de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de caracteres para medidas.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>que define o formato de texto da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the property, of the string specified by the text parameter as drawn with the font parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um estrutura que representa o tamanho, em unidades especificadas pelo propriedade da cadeia de caracteres especificada pelo text parâmetro como desenhadas com a font parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: font is .
trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> within the specified layout area.
trans-unit.target: Mede a cadeia de caracteres especificada quando desenhado com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> dentro da área de layout especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>método foi projetado para uso com o indivíduo cadeias de caracteres e inclui uma pequena quantidade de espaço extra antes e após a cadeia de caracteres para permitir em saliência em relação glifos.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>método ajusta pontos de glifo para otimizar a qualidade do vídeo e pode exibir uma cadeia de caracteres do relatado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter métricas adequadas para cadeias de caracteres adjacentes no layout (por exemplo, quando a implementação de texto formatado), use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>método ou uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>métodos que leva um <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>e passe <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, certifique-se de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de caracteres para medidas.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> defines the text format of the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>Define o formato de texto da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure that specifies the maximum layout area for the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>estrutura que especifica a área de layout máximo para o texto.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the property, of the string specified by the text parameter as drawn with the font parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um estrutura que representa o tamanho, em unidades especificadas pelo propriedade da cadeia de caracteres especificada pelo text parâmetro como desenhadas com a font parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: font is .
trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mede a cadeia de caracteres especificada quando desenhado com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>).
trans-unit.target: O `width` parâmetro especifica o valor máximo do componente largura do retornado <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>estrutura (<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>).</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SizeF>

trans-unit.source: If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width.
trans-unit.target: Se o `width` parâmetro for menor que a largura real da cadeia de caracteres, retornada <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>componente será truncado para um valor que representa o número máximo de caracteres que serão ajustados a largura especificada.</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To accommodate the entire string, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap.
trans-unit.target: Para acomodar a cadeia de caracteres inteira, retornada <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>componente é ajustado para um valor que permite exibir a cadeia de caracteres com contorno de caractere.</xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>método foi projetado para uso com o indivíduo cadeias de caracteres e inclui uma pequena quantidade de espaço extra antes e após a cadeia de caracteres para permitir em saliência em relação glifos.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>método ajusta pontos de glifo para otimizar a qualidade do vídeo e pode exibir uma cadeia de caracteres do relatado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter métricas adequadas para cadeias de caracteres adjacentes no layout (por exemplo, quando a implementação de texto formatado), use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>método ou uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>métodos que leva um <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>e passe <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, certifique-se de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the MeasureString methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.

trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>método ajusta pontos de glifo para otimizar a qualidade do vídeo e pode exibir uma cadeia de caracteres do relatado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter métricas adequadas para cadeias de caracteres adjacentes no layout (por exemplo, quando a implementação de texto formatado), use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>método ou uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>métodos que leva um <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>e passe <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, certifique-se de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: String to measure.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de caracteres para medidas.

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>Define o formato de texto da cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> structure that specifies the maximum layout area for the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>estrutura que especifica a área de layout máximo para o texto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> that represents formatting information, such as line spacing, for the string.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref>que representa informações de formatação, como o espaçamento entre linhas, a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a structure that represents the size, in the units specified by the property, of the string specified in the text parameter as drawn with the font parameter and the stringFormat parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um estrutura que representa o tamanho, em unidades especificadas pelo propriedade de cadeia de caracteres especificada no text parâmetro como desenhadas com a font parâmetro e o stringFormat parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: font is .
trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> and formatted with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mede a cadeia de caracteres especificada quando desenhado com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> e formatados com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>método foi projetado para uso com o indivíduo cadeias de caracteres e inclui uma pequena quantidade de espaço extra antes e após a cadeia de caracteres para permitir em saliência em relação glifos.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>método ajusta pontos de glifo para otimizar a qualidade do vídeo e pode exibir uma cadeia de caracteres do relatado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A> method or one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> methods that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>, and pass <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter métricas adequadas para cadeias de caracteres adjacentes no layout (por exemplo, quando a implementação de texto formatado), use o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>método ou uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A>métodos que leva um <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>e passe <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.GenericTypographic%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, ensure the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A> for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, certifique-se de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A>

trans-unit.source: font is .
trans-unit.target: fontis .

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the world transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and specified the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Multiplica a transformação global deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e especificado o <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the matrix specified by the `matrix` parameter, so that the result is `matrix` x world transformation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método precede a matriz especificada pelo `matrix` parâmetro, para que o resultado é `matrix` x transformações de mundo.

trans-unit.source: 4x4 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that multiplies the world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 4 x&4; <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> que multiplica a transformação do mundo.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the world transformation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and specified the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Multiplica a transformação global deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e especificado o <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: A value of<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> for the `order` parameter specifies that the order of the multiplication is `matrix` x world transformation.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> para o `order` parâmetro especifica que a ordem da multiplicação é `matrix` x transformações de mundo.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> for `order` specifies that the order of the multiplication is world transformation x `matrix`.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>para `order` Especifica que a ordem da multiplicação transformações de mundo x `matrix`.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder>

trans-unit.source: 4x4 <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that multiplies the world transformation.
trans-unit.target: 4 x&4; <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> que multiplica a transformação do mundo.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that determines the order of the multiplication.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> enumeração que determina a ordem da multiplicação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scaling between world units and page units for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a escala entre unidades do mundo e página para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a value for the scaling between world units and page units for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica um valor para o dimensionamento entre unidades do mundo e página para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a unidade de medida usado para coordenadas de página neste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The graphics unit is the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.
trans-unit.target: A unidade de gráfico é a unidade de medida usado para coordenadas da página nesse <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> values other than <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref> valores diferentes de <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: PageUnit is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref>, which is not a physical unit.
trans-unit.target: PageUnit é definido como <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref>, que não é uma unidade física.

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value specifying how pixels are offset during rendering of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica como os pixels são deslocados durante a renderização deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify either higher quality, slower rendering, or lower quality, faster rendering of the contents of this<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>object.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para especificar um ou mais alta qualidade, a renderização mais lenta ou qualidade inferior, mais rápido a renderização do conteúdo desse<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode"></xref> enumeration
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica um membro do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PixelOffsetMode"> </xref> enumeração

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de um identificador de contexto de dispositivo obtido por uma chamada anterior a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>método deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>dois métodos que permitem que você obtenha e liberar o identificador para um dispositivo do Windows.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Você sempre deve seguir uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>com uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A>Quando tiver terminado com o identificador do Windows.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.ReleaseHdc%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases a device context handle obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de um identificador de contexto de dispositivo obtido por uma chamada anterior a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>método deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo é uma estrutura de Windows com base em [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] que define um conjunto de objetos gráficos e seus atributos associados, bem como os modos de gráficos que afetam a saída.

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc methods must appear in pairs.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>e métodos ReleaseHdc devem aparecer em pares.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: During the scope of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A> and ReleaseHdc method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions.
trans-unit.target: Durante o escopo de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>e ReleaseHdc par de métodos, você normalmente fazer chamadas apenas a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] funções.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas em que o escopo feitas [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] métodos do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que produziu o `hdc` parâmetro falhar com um `ObjectBusy` erro.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignora quaisquer alterações de estado para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>do `hdc` parâmetro em operações subsequentes.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context obtained by a previous call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*> method of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Identificador para um contexto de dispositivo obtido por uma chamada anterior a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>método deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.GetHdc*>

trans-unit.source: Releases a handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: Libera um identificador para um contexto de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: Identificador para um contexto de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering origin of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for dithering and for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem de renderização deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para pontilhado e pincéis de hachura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure that represents the dither origin for 8-bits-per-pixel and 16-bits-per-pixel dithering and is also used to set the origin for hatch brushes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estrutura que representa a origem de pontilhado de 8 bits por pixel e 16 bits por pixel pontilhado e também é usada para definir a origem para pincéis de hachura.

trans-unit.source: Resets the clip region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to an infinite region.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a região de clip deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> a uma região de infinita.

trans-unit.source: When the clipping region of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is infinite, items that this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> draws are not clipped.
trans-unit.target: Quando a região de recorte de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é infinito, itens que este <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>desenhos não são cortados.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Resets the world transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a matriz de transformação world deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para a matriz de identidade.

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de identidade representa uma transformação com nenhuma escala, rotação ou conversão.

trans-unit.source: Resetting the world transformation of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items.
trans-unit.target: Redefinindo a transformação global deste <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a matriz de identidade significa que sua transformação world não alteram a geometria de itens transformados.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Restores the state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the state represented by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o estado deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para o estado representado por um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, um bloco de informações que mantém o estado do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é colocada em uma pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método retorna um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>que identifica esse bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to theRestore method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passa de identificação <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>theRestore método, o bloco de informações é removido da pilha e é usado para restaurar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para o estado em que estava no momento do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>retornado por uma chamada fornecida para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método pode ser transmitido apenas uma vez para o `Restore` método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method can be nested; that is, you can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method several times before you call the Restore method.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método pode ser aninhado; ou seja, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método várias vezes antes de chamar o método Restore.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que você chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método, um bloco de informações é colocado na pilha, e você recebe um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>para o bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the Restore method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passar um desses objetos para o método de restauração, que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é retornado para o estado em que estava no momento do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método de chamada que retornou que determinado <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: O bloco de informações é colocado na pilha de por que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>chamada de método é removida da pilha e todos os blocos de informações é colocado na pilha depois disso <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>chamada de método também serão removidos.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>blocos de informações de local do método na mesma pilha de chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as a Restore call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Assim como uma restauração de chamada é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>chamar, um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>chamada de método é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the Restore method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o método de restauração, todos os blocos de informações é colocado na pilha (pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>método ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref> that represents the state to which to restore this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>que representa o estado no qual restaurar este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se a rotação especificada para a matriz de transformação deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A operação de rotação consiste multiplicando-se a matriz de transformação por uma matriz cujos elementos são provenientes de `angle` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Esse método se aplica a rotação acrescentando-o para a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: Ângulo de rotação em graus.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se a rotação especificada para a matriz de transformação deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A operação de rotação consiste multiplicando-se a matriz de transformação por uma matriz cujos elementos são provenientes de `angle` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the rotation matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona ou acrescenta a matriz de transformação do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a matriz de rotação de acordo com o `order` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Angle of rotation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: Ângulo de rotação em graus.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the rotation is appended or prepended to the matrix transformation.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> enumeração que especifica se a rotação é acrescentada ou acrescentada à transformação de matriz.

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and identifies the saved state with a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Salva o estado atual deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e identifica o estado salvo com um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call the Save method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, an information block that holds the state of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is put on a stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o método Save de um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, um bloco de informações que mantém o estado do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é colocada em uma pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The Save method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> that identifies that information block.
trans-unit.target: O método Save retorna um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>que identifica esse bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: When you pass the identifying <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to the state it was in at the time of the Save method call.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passa de identificação <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método, o bloco de informações é removido da pilha e é usado para restaurar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>ao estado em que se encontrava no momento da chamada do método de salvar.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> returned by a given call to the Save method can be passed only once to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>retornado por uma chamada fornecida para salvar método pode ser transmitido apenas uma vez para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the Save method can be nested; that is, you can call the Save method several times before you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o método Save podem ser aninhadas. ou seja, você pode chamar o método Save várias vezes antes de chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time you call the Save method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> for the information block.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que você chamar o método Save, um bloco de informações é colocado na pilha e você receberá um<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> para o bloco de informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>

trans-unit.source: When you pass one of those objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is returned to the state it was in at the time of the Save method call that returned that particular <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você passar um desses objetos para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método, o que <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é retornado para o estado em que estava no momento da chamada do método Save que retornou que determinado <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information block placed on the stack by that Save method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that Save method call are also removed.
trans-unit.target: O bloco de informações é colocado na pilha de por que salvar método chamada é removida da pilha, e todos os blocos de informações colocadas em pilha depois que salvar método chamada também serão removidos.

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the Save method.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>blocos de informações de local do método na mesma pilha de chamadas para o método de salvar.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Just as a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> call is paired with a Save call, a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method call is paired with a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Assim como um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>chamada é emparelhada com uma chamada de salvar um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>chamada de método é emparelhada com um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the Save method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the Save method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (com o método Save ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o método Save são removidos da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Restore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the Save method or by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method) after the corresponding call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> method are removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, quando você chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>método, todos os blocos de informações colocadas na pilha (com o método Save ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método) após a chamada correspondente para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A>método são removidas da pilha.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"></xref> that represents the saved state of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState"> </xref> que representa o estado salvo deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> by prepending it to the object's transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se a operação de dimensionamento especificada para a matriz de transformação deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> acrescentando-o para a matriz de transformação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: A operação de escala consiste multiplicando-se a matriz de transformação por uma matriz diagonal cujos elementos são (`sx`, `sy`, 1).

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix.
trans-unit.target: Esse método precede a matriz de transformação do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a matriz de dimensionamento.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: Fator de escala na direção x.

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Fator de escala na direção y.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se a operação de dimensionamento especificada para a matriz de transformação deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1).
trans-unit.target: A operação de escala consiste multiplicando-se a matriz de transformação por uma matriz diagonal cujos elementos são (`sx`, `sy`, 1).

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the scaling matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona ou acrescenta a matriz de transformação do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a matriz escala de acordo com o `order` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x direction.
trans-unit.target: Fator de escala na direção x.

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y direction.
trans-unit.target: Fator de escala na direção y.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the scaling operation is prepended or appended to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> enumeração que especifica se a operação de escala é anexada ou anexada a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: Se o caminho de elementos gráficos representados pelo `path` parâmetro não for fechado, um segmento adicional é adicionado do último ponto até o primeiro ponto para fechar o caminho.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>que representa a nova região de recorte.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Clip" name="Clip" href=""></xref> property of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Clip" name="Clip" href=""> </xref> propriedade especificada <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> from which to take the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>de qual seja a nova região de recorte.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Define a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para o retângulo especificado por uma <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that represents the new clip region.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>estrutura que representa a nova região de recorte.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the rectangle specified by a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Define a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para o retângulo especificado por uma <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the new clip region.

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to the result of the specified operation combining the current clip region and the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para o resultado da operação especificada combina a região de clip atual e especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path.
trans-unit.target: Se o caminho de elementos gráficos representados pelo `path` parâmetro não for fechado, um segmento adicional é adicionado do último ponto até o primeiro ponto para fechar o caminho.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"> </xref> enumeração que especifica a operação de combinação para usar.

trans-unit.source: Member from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies the combining operation to use.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CombineMode"> </xref> enumeração que especifica a operação de combinação para usar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering quality for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a qualidade de renderização para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The smoothing mode specifies whether lines, curves, and the edges of filled areas use smoothing (also called antialiasing).
trans-unit.target: O modo Especifica se linhas, curvas e as bordas de áreas preenchidas usam suavização (também chamado de suavização).

trans-unit.source: One exception is that path gradient brushes do not obey the smoothing mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção é que pincéis de gradiente do caminho não obedece o modo.

trans-unit.source: Areas filled using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the SmoothingMode property.
trans-unit.target: Áreas preenchidas usando um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>são renderizados da mesma forma (alias), independentemente da propriedade SmoothingMode.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gamma correction value for rendering text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de correção gama de processamento de texto.

trans-unit.source: The gamma correction value must be between 0 and 12.
trans-unit.target: O valor de correção gama deve estar entre 0 e 12.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 4.

trans-unit.source: The gamma correction value used for rendering antialiased and ClearType text.
trans-unit.target: O valor de correção gama usado para renderização antialiasing e texto ClearType.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rendering mode for text associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de renderização de texto associado a esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The text rendering hint specifies whether text renders with antialiasing.
trans-unit.target: A dica de renderização de texto Especifica se o texto renderizado com suavização.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should not use a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CompositingMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode> when the TextRenderingHint property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você não deve usar um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CompositingMode%2A>valor de propriedade de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode>quando a propriedade TextRenderingHint está definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>.</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CompositingMode> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.CompositingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An exception could occur or the image may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção pode ocorrer ou a imagem talvez não sejam renderizadas corretamente.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric world transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cópia da transformação world geométrico para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GDI+ uses three coordinate spaces: world, page, and device.
trans-unit.target: GDI+ usa três espaços de coordenadas: mundo, página e dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: World coordinates are the coordinates used to model a particular graphic world and are the coordinates you pass to methods in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas do mundo são as coordenadas usadas para modelar um mundo de gráfico específico e as coordenadas de que passar para os métodos do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Page coordinates refer to the coordinate system used by a drawing surface, such as a form or a control.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas da página se referem ao sistema de coordenadas usado por um superfície de desenho, como um formulário ou controle.

trans-unit.source: Device coordinates are the coordinates used by the physical device being drawn on, such as a screen or a printer.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas do dispositivo são as coordenadas usadas pelo dispositivo físico desenhado, como uma tela ou uma impressora.

trans-unit.source: The Transform property represents the world transformation, which maps world coordinates to page coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Transform representa as transformações de mundo, que mapeia as coordenadas do mundo para coordenadas da página.

trans-unit.source: Because the matrix returned and by the Transform property is a copy of the geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: Como a matriz retornada e pela transformação de propriedade é uma cópia da transformação geométrica, descarte da matriz quando você não precisa mais dela.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents the geometric world transformation for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> que representa a transformação world Geométrico <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Transforms an array of points from one coordinate space to another using the current world and page transformations of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Transforma uma matriz de pontos de um espaço de coordenadas para outro usando as transformações de mundo e página atuais deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the destination coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o espaço de coordenadas de destino.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the source coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o espaço de coordenadas de origem.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represents the points to transformation.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> estruturas que representa os pontos para transformação.

trans-unit.source: Transforms an array of points from one coordinate space to another using the current world and page transformations of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Transforma uma matriz de pontos de um espaço de coordenadas para outro usando as transformações de mundo e página atuais deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the destination coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o espaço de coordenadas de destino.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"></xref> enumeration that specifies the source coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CoordinateSpace"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o espaço de coordenadas de origem.

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represent the points to transform.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que representam os pontos de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Translates the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> by specified amounts in the horizontal and vertical directions.
trans-unit.target: Converte a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> pelos valores especificados nas direções horizontais e verticais.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x da tradução.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y da tradução.

trans-unit.source: Translates the clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> by specified amounts in the horizontal and vertical directions.
trans-unit.target: Converte a região de recorte deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> pelos valores especificados nas direções horizontais e verticais.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x da tradução.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y da tradução.

trans-unit.source: Changes the origin of the coordinate system by prepending the specified translation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Altera a origem do sistema de coordenadas acrescentando a conversão especificada para a matriz de transformação deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The origin is typically the upper-left-hand corner of the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: A origem é geralmente o canto superior esquerdo da superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters.
trans-unit.target: A operação de conversão consiste multiplicando-se a matriz de transformação por uma matriz cuja parte de tradução é o `dx` e `dy` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: This method applies the translation by prepending the translation matrix to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Esse método aplica-se a tradução acrescentando a matriz de tradução para a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x da tradução.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y da tradução.

trans-unit.source: Changes the origin of the coordinate system by applying the specified translation to the transformation matrix of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: Altera a origem do sistema de coordenadas, aplicando a conversão especificada para a matriz de transformação deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na ordem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters.
trans-unit.target: A operação de conversão consiste multiplicando-se a matriz de transformação por uma matriz cuja parte de tradução é o `dx` e `dy` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> by the translation matrix according to the `order` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona ou acrescenta a matriz de transformação do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para a matriz de conversão de acordo com o `order` parâmetro.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x da tradução.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the translation.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y da tradução.

trans-unit.source: Member of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the translation is prepended or appended to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Membro de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder"> </xref> enumeração que especifica se a conversão é anexada ou anexada a matriz de transformação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle of the visible clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador da região de recorte visível deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o retângulo resultante é designada pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default unit is pixels.
trans-unit.target: A unidade padrão é pixels.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>é geralmente associado um controle e a origem do retângulo serão relativas à área do cliente do controle.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> and the clipping region of the window.
trans-unit.target: A região de recorte visível é a interseção da região de recorte deste <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>e a região de recorte da janela.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents a bounding rectangle for the visible clipping region of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura que representa um retângulo para a região de recorte visível deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.
